exceptions.tactic: intros u m n p H.
intros u' m n p H.
intros u' m' n p H.
intros u' m' n' p H.
intros u' m' n' p' H.

ctx: induction m as [|m IHm]; intros n H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

ctx: induction m as [|m IHm]; intros n H.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros u m n p H. revert n H. induction m as [|m IHm]; intros n H. - simpl. reflexivity. - destruct n as [|n]. + simpl. rewrite sum_f_rw_0. reflexivity. + apply le_plus_minus in H. rewrite H.
